name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior MLOps Engineer with 13+ years of full stack development experience, specializing in **MLOps**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** processes. Proficient in orchestrating machine learning workflows and deploying scalable applications using **Python** and frameworks like **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**. Deep expertise in creating cloud-native solutions on platforms such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, with a focus on automation tools and data security practices.

Skilled in leveraging advanced monitoring tools including **Prometheus** and **Grafana** to ensure system reliability and performance. Demonstrated ability to build and manage AI/ML platforms that drive predictive analytics and real-time processing. Strong problem-solving and communication skills contribute to effectively aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
